title: Livingston v Aberdeen: Team news
title_page: Livingston v Aberdeen: Team news - BBC Sport
maintext:
Livingston goalkeeper Shamal George is suspended while Dan MacKay could go into David Martindaleâ€™s squad after signing on loan from Hibernian.
Liverpool loan player Rhys Williams will miss out on his Aberdeen debut because of a back injury but fellow centre-back Angus MacDonald is battling to feature after a knee problem.
